UniprotID	P04075-2
Accession	P04075;B4DXI7;Q6FH76;Q6FI10;Q96B15;Q9BWD9;Q9UCN2
EntryName	ALDOA_HUMAN
ProteinName	Fructose-bisphosphate aldolase A (EC 4.1.2.13) (Lung cancer antigen NY-LU-1) (Muscle-type aldolase)
GeneName	ALDOA ALDA
Length	418
Function	Catalyzes the reversible conversion of beta-D-fructose 1,6-bisphosphate (FBP) into two triose phosphate and plays a key role in glycolysis and gluconeogenesis (PubMed:14766013). In addition, may also function as scaffolding protein (By similarity).
Subcellular Location	Cytoplasm; Myofibril; Sarcomere; I band; Cytoplasm; Myofibril; Sarcomere; M line
